sentences.sContent: He grabbed her arm and dragged her into the room.
sentences.sCn: 他抓住她的手臂把她拖进房间。

sentences.sContent: The satellite acts as a drag on the shuttle.
sentences.sCn: 卫星是对航天飞机发展的阻碍。

synos.tran: 拖累；拖拉；缓慢而吃力地行进
拖曳；缓慢而吃力地行进

phrases.pCn: 直线加速赛；短程高速赛车；减重短程高速汽车赛；街头飚车（汽车）
阻力矩；曳力矩；拖曳转矩

words.tran: 拖曳等之人或物；小型拖网渔船

trans.tranCn: 拖着脚步走，在地上拖着行进；慢吞吞地进行，拖延
trans.tranOther: to pull something along the ground, often because it is too heavy to carry
to pull something along the ground, often because it is too heavy to carry

trans.tranCn: 累赘， 障碍； 一吸， 一抽， 一饮
trans.tranOther: If something is a drag on the development or progress of something, it slows it down or makes it more difficult
